issue.title: [Python] Exclude hidden files when reading Parquet dataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2575](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2575). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
On Unix systems hidden files are listed because os.walk does not care about hidden files. This especially creates a problem in macOS where .DS_Store files are created automatically.
